caption:
This aerial photograph captures a scenic landscape that includes a mix of natural and man-made elements. The image shows a large industrial compound comprised of several large buildings with white and gray roofs nestled among extensive green forests. The industrial area is located near a paved road, indicating some access for vehicles. The surrounding terrain is diverse: dense forests dominate the majority of the photograph, contributing to a lush green backdrop.

In the distance, a large water body, possibly a lake or a wide river, is visible along with a populated area near its shores where smaller buildings and clearings can be seen. Beyond the water, the horizon is filled with a range of mountains, adding a dramatic backdrop to the scene. The mountains are faintly shrouded in mist, enhancing the depth and vastness of the view.

The composition of the photograph, with the industrial complex in the foreground and the sweeping views of natural landscapes stretching into the background, highlights a contrast between development and nature. Overall, the image provides a striking view of human infrastructure surrounded by the natural environment, showcasing the interaction between human activities and the natural world.
title: Aerial view of the Kitsap County Fairgrounds with Silverdale in the background. This community and others in the area will be affected by population growth when the Navy's proposed Trident submarine base is built nearby.
